org.ietf.nea.pt.socket

Interface Negotiator

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultNegotiationInitiator, DefaultNegotiationResponder

    public interface Negotiator
    Generic version negotiation handler for an IETF socket transport connection. It is used to negotiate the used protocol version.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      short getNegotiatedVersion()
      Returns the negotiated version number after a call to negotiate(SocketMessenger).
      NegotiatorTypeEnum getType()
      Returns the type of the implemented negotiator.
      void negotiate(SocketMessenger connection)
      Executes the transport protocol version negotiation with a remote peer.

    • Method Detail

      • getType

        NegotiatorTypeEnum getType()
        Returns the type of the implemented negotiator.
        Returns:
        the type as enum constant (Initiator or Responder)

      • negotiate

        void negotiate(SocketMessenger connection)
               throws ValidationException,
                      ConnectionException,
                      SerializationException
        Executes the transport protocol version negotiation with a remote peer.
        Throws:
        SerializationException - if an error occurs at message serialization
        ValidationException - if an error occurs at message parsing
        ConnectionException - if the connection is broken

      • getNegotiatedVersion

        short getNegotiatedVersion()
        Returns the negotiated version number after a call to negotiate(SocketMessenger).
        Returns:
        the negotiated version or 0 if version negotiation is pending or has failed
